background: Soil moisture plays an important role in land-atmosphere interactions. It is an important geophysical parameter in research on climate, hydrology, agriculture, and forestry. Soil moisture has important climatic effects by influencing ground evapotranspiration, runoff, surface reflectivity, surface emissivity, surface sensible heat, and latent heat flux. At the global scale, the extent of its influence on the atmosphere is second only to that of sea surface temperature. Soil moisture affects matter and energy balances between land and atmosphere through influencing moisture flux, sensible heat, and latent heat flux. Accurate estimates of the spatial and temporal distribution of soil moisture are of vital importance to further understanding the ecological and physical processes of land and land-atmosphere interactions, and are of great importance in the research and application of meteorology in environmental management, ecology, hydrology, and agriculture. Soil moisture information can currently be acquired with the following methods: regular and field observations, satellite remote sensing, and land hydrological modeling and simulation. However, soil moisture observations based on satellite remote sensing are also problematic. Precision of soil moisture inversion is related to soil type, ground surface roughness, and vegetation coverage. The uncertainty in these parameters results in inversion errors and insufficient temporal and spatial resolutions. Soil moisture obtained through land hydrological modeling simulation and calculation has good temporal frequency and spatial distribution. However, its precision is influenced greatly by model structure and input data. Data assimilation methods used currently in atmospheric, marine, and land data assimilation systems include mainly the optimal interpolation method, 3-D variation method, 4-D variation method, Kalman filter, and EnKF. EnKF is an assimilation method used widely in land model assimilation systems, and uses the Monte Carlo method (overall integration method) to calculate predicted error covariance of the state.

Yang et al. [6] developed an automatic rating system used to estimate moisture and energy balances of soil by assimilating AMSR-E vertical polarization 6.9 and 18.7 GHz luminance temperature data. Tian et al. [7–13], Zhang et al. [14, 15], and Jia et. al. [16] researched the improvement of land data assimilation methods and the rating of microwave luminance temperature assimilation observation operator models.

The land surface model is the core of the land data assimilation system. The CLM3.0 model is designed mainly for coupling with the atmospheric numerical model and provides the surface albedo (direct and scattered light within the visible and infrared bands), upward long-wave radiation, sensible heat flux, latent heat flux, water vapor flux, and east-to-west and south-to-north surface stress needed by the atmospheric model. One of the difficulties preventing us from improving the land model simulation precision is the lack of long-term, high-resolution, observational atmospheric driving data. The advanced microwave scanning radiometer (AMSR-E) carried by EOS/Aqua is the world's first sensor capable of providing soil moisture service outputs at the global scale.
research objective: This paper presents a China Land Soil Moisture Data Assimilation System (CLSMDAS) based on EnKF and land process models, and results of the application of this system in the China Land Soil Moisture Data Assimilation tests.

This paper explains the composition of the China Land Soil Moisture Data Assimilation System (CLSMDAS), processing methods and quality inspection of atmospheric driving data, the performance test of CLSMDAS with single-point observation data, error analysis of observed soil moisture data, and design, and analysis of the CLSMDAS method based on soil water model and station data.

In this paper, inverted precipitation and ground-incident solar radiation products acquired through high spatial and temporal resolution FY2C satellite data were introduced and combined with the NCEP reanalysis data to establish a set of high-quality atmospheric driving data which covers the Chinese region.
challenges: One of the difficulties preventing us from improving the land model simulation precision is the lack of long-term, high-resolution, observational atmospheric driving data. Due to insufficient available ground-level observation soil moisture data, the large error in observed soil moisture, and the inherent high variability of the spatial distribution of soil moisture, it is difficult to verify the assimilated soil moisture data.
methods: The CLSMDAS established in this paper was used to carry out a soil moisture data assimilation sensitivity experiment. We downloaded and processed AMSR-E daily output data between 2004 and 2007 and used regular nationwide soil moisture observation data, detailed soil moisture observation data from Inner Mongolia and Henan Province, and AMSR-E inverted soil moisture data for a comparative analysis. After CLSMDAS was established, first we used single-point observation data acquired from ecological stations for the land soil moisture data assimilation experiment and analyzed the performance of this assimilation system. In this paper, the ground-based observation data provided by newly-built climatic observation stations of China Meteorological Administration was used for a comparative verification of the FY2C ground-incident solar radiation data between July 2005 and June 2009.
dataset: FY2C/D/E satellite precipitation estimate outputs can be downloaded free of charge from the website of the China Satellite Data Service Center (http://satellite.cma.gov.cn/). The atmospheric driving data include: atmospheric temperature, relative humidity at 2 m altitude, wind speed, atmospheric pressure, and precipitation; surface short-wave radiation and 10 cm soil moisture data observed at ground level. The observation data were AMSR-E inverted soil moisture data downloaded from NASA’s official website (http://nsidc.org/data/amsre/).
findings: Both simulation and assimilation results of the land model reflected reasonably the temporal-spatial distribution of soil moisture. The assimilated soil moisture distribution matches very well with severe summer droughts in Chongqing and Sichuan Province in August 2006, the worst since the foundation of the People’s Republic of China in 1949. It also matches drought regions that occurred in eastern Hubei and southern Guangxi in September.

Analysis of the assimilation experiment between June and September 2006 shows that the CLSMDAS soil moisture distribution is consistent with soil moisture observed on the ground. The CLSMDAS soil moisture distribution on August 18, 2006 showed significantly lower soil moisture values in drought regions of Chongqing and Sichuan than in surrounding regions.
backgroundCn: 土壤湿度在陆地与大气相互作用中扮演着重要角色。它是气候、 hydrology、农业和林业研究中的一个重要地球物理参数。土壤湿度通过影响地面蒸散、径流、表面反射率、表面发射率、表面感热和潜热通量，对气候产生重要影响。在全球范围内，其对大气的影响程度仅次于海表温度。土壤湿度通过影响湿气通量、感热和潜热通量，影响陆地与大气之间的物质和能量平衡。准确估计土壤湿度的时空分布对进一步理解陆地及其与大气相互作用的生态和物理过程至关重要，并在气象、环境管理、生态学、水文学和农业的研究与应用中具有重要意义。目前，土壤湿度信息可以通过以下方法获取：常规和现场观测、卫星遥感以及陆地水文模型和模拟。然而，基于卫星遥感的土壤湿度观测也存在问题。土壤湿度反演的精度与土壤类型、地面表面粗糙度和植被覆盖度有关。这些参数的不确定性导致反演误差和时空分辨率不足。通过陆地水文模型模拟和计算获得的土壤湿度具有良好的时间频率和空间分布。然而，其精度受到模型结构和输入数据的很大影响。目前在大气、海洋和陆地数据同化系统中使用的数据同化方法主要包括最优插值法、3-D变分法、4-D变分法、卡尔曼滤波和EnKF。EnKF是一种广泛应用于陆地模型同化系统的同化方法，利用蒙特卡罗方法（整体积分法）计算状态的预测误差协方差。
Yang等人[6]开发了一种自动评分系统，用于通过同化AMSR-E垂直极化6.9和18.7 GHz亮度温度数据来估计土壤的水分和能量平衡。Tian等人[7–13]、Zhang等人[14, 15]和Jia等人[16]研究了土地数据同化方法的改进以及微波亮度温度同化观测算子模型的评分。

陆面模型是陆地数据同化系统的核心。CLM3.0模型主要设计用于与大气数值模型耦合，提供大气模型所需的表面反照率（可见光和红外波段的直接和散射光）、向上长波辐射、感热通量、潜热通量、水汽通量，以及东西向和南北向的表面应力。阻碍我们提高陆面模型模拟精度的一个困难是缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据。由EOS/Aqua携带的先进微波扫描辐射计（AMSR-E）是全球首个能够提供土壤湿度服务输出的传感器。
research objectiveCn: 本文提出了一种基于EnKF和陆地过程模型的中国土壤湿度数据同化系统（CLSMDAS），并展示了该系统在中国土壤湿度数据同化测试中的应用结果。
本文解释了中国土地土壤湿度数据同化系统（CLSMDAS）的组成、气象驱动数据的处理方法和质量检验、CLSMDAS与单点观测数据的性能测试、观测土壤湿度数据的误差分析，以及基于土壤水分模型和站点数据的CLSMDAS方法的设计与分析。
在本文中，通过高空间和时间分辨率的FY2C卫星数据引入了反演降水和地面入射太阳辐射产品，并结合NCEP再分析数据，建立了一套覆盖中国地区的高质量大气驱动数据。
challengesCn: 阻碍我们提高陆地模型模拟精度的一个困难是缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据。由于可用的地面观测土壤湿度数据不足、观测土壤湿度误差较大以及土壤湿度空间分布固有的高变异性，验证同化的土壤湿度数据变得困难。
methodsCn: 本文建立的CLSMDAS用于进行土壤湿度数据同化敏感性实验。我们下载并处理了2004年至2007年间的AMSR-E日输出数据，并使用了全国范围内的常规土壤湿度观测数据、内蒙古和河南省的详细土壤湿度观测数据以及AMSR-E反演的土壤湿度数据进行比较分析。在建立CLSMDAS后，首先使用从生态站获取的单点观测数据进行陆地土壤湿度数据同化实验，并分析了该同化系统的性能。本文使用中国气象局新建气候观测站提供的地面观测数据，对2005年7月至2009年6月的FY2C地面入射太阳辐射数据进行了比较验证。
datasetCn: FY2C/D/E 卫星降水估计输出可以从中国卫星数据服务中心的网站（http://satellite.cma.gov.cn/）免费下载。大气驱动数据包括：2 米高度的气温、相对湿度、风速、大气压力和降水；地面观测的短波辐射和 10 厘米土壤湿度数据。观测数据为从 NASA 官方网站（http://nsidc.org/data/amsre/）下载的 AMSR-E 反演土壤湿度数据。
findingsCn: 土地模型的模拟和同化结果合理地反映了土壤湿度的时空分布。经过同化的土壤湿度分布与2006年8月重庆和四川省的严重夏季干旱情况非常吻合，这是自1949年中华人民共和国成立以来最严重的干旱。同时，它也与9月份发生在东部湖北和南部广西的干旱区域相匹配。
2006年6月至9月的同化实验分析表明，CLSMDAS土壤湿度分布与地面观测的土壤湿度一致。2006年8月18日的CLSMDAS土壤湿度分布显示，重庆和四川的干旱地区土壤湿度值显著低于周边地区。

background: The quality of atmospheric forcing data is one of the most important factors in hydrological simulation. However, the output uncertainty of hydrological models is increased by error propagation. Although the terrain of China is vast and complex, meteorological stations are scarce in contrast. The existing observation stations are unable to simulate large-scale hydrological simulations (water, energy balance). The China Meteorological Assimilation Driving Datasets for the SWAT model (CMADS) was established based on the China Meteorological Administration Land Data Assimilation System (CLDAS) in this research. The Heihe River Basin was selected as the research area in this study. The CMADS, Climate Forecast System Reanalysis (CFSR), and the traditional weather station (TWS) were forcing the Soil and Water Assessment Tool (SWAT) model separately. According to the observation results obtained from three hydrological stations (Ying Luoxia, Qilian Mountains, and Zha Mashenke) in the Heihe River Basin, the runoff simulated by the CMADS data overall was better than the simulation results driven by the CFSR and the TWS.
research objective: This study aims to analyze the application of the CMADS dataset in driving watershed hydrological models, specifically using the Heihe River Basin as a case study. The research seeks to compare the performance of the CMADS dataset with the CFSR and traditional weather station data in driving the SWAT model, to evaluate the advantages of CMADS in simulating hydrological processes in regions lacking meteorological stations.
challenges: The existing observation stations are unable to simulate large-scale hydrological simulations (water, energy balance). Even though the CFSR dataset is widely applied internationally, its applicability and accuracy in China are questioned due to the lack of observational correction and quality control in the region.
methods: In this research, the CMADS dataset was used to drive the SWAT model in the Heihe River Basin, and the results were compared with those obtained using the CFSR and traditional weather station data. The study involved calibrating and validating the runoff at three hydrological control stations (Ying Luoxia, Qilian Mountains, and Zha Mashenke) in the Heihe River Basin. The CMADS dataset was established based on the China Meteorological Administration Land Data Assimilation System (CLDAS).
dataset: The CMADS dataset was established based on the China Meteorological Administration Land Data Assimilation System (CLDAS) in this research. The CMADS, Climate Forecast System Reanalysis (CFSR), and the traditional weather station (TWS) data were used to force the Soil and Water Assessment Tool (SWAT) model separately.
findings: The runoff simulated by the CMADS data overall was better than the simulation results driven by the CFSR and the TWS. The CMADS + SWAT mode can reproduce the spatial and temporal response characteristics of all surface components (such as soil moisture, snow melting, etc.) in the Heihe River basin. We conclude that the CMADS data have obvious advantages for large-scale coupling atmospheric and hydrologic, hydrological process simulation.
backgroundCn: 大气强迫数据的质量是水文模拟中最重要的因素之一。然而，水文模型的输出不确定性因误差传播而增加。尽管中国的地形广阔而复杂，但气象站的分布相对稀少。现有的观测站无法进行大规模的水文模拟（水量、能量平衡）。本研究基于中国气象局陆地数据同化系统（CLDAS）建立了中国气象同化驱动数据集（CMADS）。本研究选择了黑河流域作为研究区域。CMADS、气候预报系统再分析（CFSR）和传统气象站（TWS）分别对土壤和水评估工具（SWAT）模型进行了强迫。根据在黑河流域三个水文站（营洛峡、祁连山和扎马申克）获得的观测结果，CMADS数据驱动的径流模拟整体上优于CFSR和TWS驱动的模拟结果。
research objectiveCn: 本研究旨在分析CMADS数据集在驱动流域水文模型中的应用，特别是以黑河流域为案例。研究旨在比较CMADS数据集与CFSR和传统气象站数据在驱动SWAT模型中的表现，以评估CMADS在模拟缺乏气象站地区水文过程中的优势。
challengesCn: 现有的观测站无法进行大规模的水文模拟（包括水量和能量平衡）。尽管CFSR数据集在国际上被广泛应用，但由于该地区缺乏观测校正和质量控制，其适用性和准确性在中国受到质疑。
methodsCn: 在这项研究中，CMADS 数据集被用于驱动 Heihe 河流域的 SWAT 模型，并将结果与使用 CFSR 和传统气象站数据获得的结果进行了比较。该研究涉及在 Heihe 河流域的三个水文控制站（营洛峡、祁连山和扎马申克）进行径流的校准和验证。CMADS 数据集是基于中国气象局陆地数据同化系统（CLDAS）建立的。
datasetCn: CMADS 数据集是基于中国气象局陆地数据同化系统（CLDAS）建立的。在本研究中，CMADS、气候预报系统再分析（CFSR）和传统气象站（TWS）数据分别用于驱动土壤和水评估工具（SWAT）模型。
findingsCn: CMADS数据驱动的径流模拟整体上优于CFSR和TWS驱动的模拟结果。CMADS + SWAT模型能够再现黑河流域所有地表成分（如土壤湿度、雪融化等）的空间和时间响应特征。我们得出结论，CMADS数据在大规模耦合大气与水文、以及水文过程模拟方面具有明显优势。

background: Distributed hydrologic models are being widely used to understand climate changing impacts on hydrological processes and water balance. There is an increasing need of meteorological forcing data with high precision and temporal-spatial resolution for driving hydrological models to provide reliable model simulations to support water and land management practices. Recent studies show that the quality of meteorological data has been a major uncertainty source for determining model performance. In addition, various atmospheric reanalysis data exist and have been widely used in hydrologic modeling studies. Although the weather patterns and assimilation systems used by these reanalysis datasets are different from each other, the common point is that the patterns and assimilation systems are business mature numerical forecasting models. Different reanalysis data has its own advantages and disadvantages, and any kind of data does not have the same performance in different areas and time periods. Because of the coarse resolution, global climate modes (GCMs) are unable to be completely applied in regional climate pattern, which is also stated in the IPCC fourth report. Given the poor performance of regional climate models and reanalysis datasets in China, it is necessary to develop a high resolution dataset covering the whole country and evaluate its performance in large-scale hydrological modeling.
research objective: This study presents the newly developed CMADS dataset which can be used for large-scale hydrological modeling with SWAT model. This study compared the modeling performance with inputs from CMADS, CFSR and TWS, and then evaluated the added value of the newly developed CMADS dataset in large-scale modeling studies with Heihe River Basin as the study region.
challenges: The usability and accuracy of CFSR dataset in China are not satisfactory. Due to the low resolution of JRA-25, it is not suitable for mesoscale analysis. Studies show that GCMs cannot be directly applied in the assessment of regional-scale future hydrological changes. Given the poor performance of regional climate models and reanalysis datasets in China, it is necessary to develop a high resolution dataset covering the whole country and evaluate its performance in large-scale hydrological modeling.
methods: This study used the SWAT model to illustrate the added value of the CMADS data with Heihe River Basin as the study region. Then three simulations were conducted with SWAT model driven by CMADS, CFSR and TWS, respectively. In order to verify the applicability of CMADS in China, we used bilinear interpolation method to compare CMADS dataset with elements from national automatic stations of China Meteorological Administration. The study used SWAT-CUP software developed by EWAGE to analyze and calibrate parameters of three modes. SUFI-2 algorithm was chosen to run SWAT-CUP Software, including model calibration, validation, sensitivity analysis and uncertainty analysis. The study chose the first 14 sensitive parameters for calibration according to significant parameters and simulated conditions between 2009 and 2010 and verified the model performance from 2011 to 2013 driven by different datasets.
dataset: The CFSR dataset is provided by American National Environmental Forecasting Center, which is a global reanalysis dataset with high resolution. CMADS is a new dataset developed by this study, which is based on CLDAS data assimilation technology. The CMADS dataset consists of two formats (i.e. .dbf and .txt), which can be easily converted for use in other hydrological models. The first version of CMADS dataset covers the whole East Asian (0N~65N, 60E~160E). The spatial resolution of CMADS V1.0, CMADS V1.1, CMADS V1.2 and CMADS V1.3 are 0.333, 0.25, 0.125 and 0.0625 degree, respectively at daily time step from 2008 to 2014. The study used 11 and 15 meteorological stations from CMADS and CFSR dataset respectively, while only 4 TWS (T1-T4) were available in this basin.
findings: In general, CMADS has higher accuracy than CFRS when evaluated against observations at TWS; CMADS also provides spatially continuous climate field to drive distributed hydrologic models, which is an important advantage over TWS climate data, particular in regions with sparse weather stations. Therefore, SWAT model simulations driven with CMADS and TWS achieved similar performances in terms of monthly and daily stream flow simulations, and both of them outperformed CFRS. The CMADS dataset is available free of charge and is expected to be a valuable addition to the existing climate reanalysis data sets for deriving distributed hydrologic modeling in China and other countries in East Asia.
backgroundCn: 分布式水文模型被广泛用于理解气候变化对水文过程和水量平衡的影响。对高精度和时空分辨率的气象强迫数据的需求日益增加，以驱动水文模型，提供可靠的模型模拟，以支持水资源和土地管理实践。最近的研究表明，气象数据的质量是决定模型性能的主要不确定性来源。此外，各种大气再分析数据已经存在并被广泛应用于水文建模研究。尽管这些再分析数据所使用的天气模式和同化系统彼此不同，但共同点在于这些模式和同化系统都是成熟的数值预报模型。不同的再分析数据各有其优缺点，任何一种数据在不同地区和时间段的表现都不相同。由于分辨率较粗，全球气候模式（GCMs）无法完全应用于区域气候模式，这在IPCC第四次报告中也有提到。鉴于区域气候模型和再分析数据在中国的表现不佳，有必要开发一个覆盖全国的高分辨率数据集，并评估其在大规模水文建模中的性能。
research objectiveCn: 本研究提出了新开发的CMADS数据集，可用于SWAT模型的大规模水文建模。该研究比较了使用CMADS、CFSR和TWS输入的建模性能，并评估了新开发的CMADS数据集在以黑河流域为研究区域的大规模建模研究中的附加价值。
challengesCn: CFSR 数据集在中国的可用性和准确性不令人满意。由于 JRA-25 的分辨率较低，不适合进行 mesoscale 分析。研究表明，GCMs 不能直接应用于区域尺度未来水文变化的评估。鉴于区域气候模型和再分析数据集在中国的表现不佳，有必要开发一个覆盖全国的高分辨率数据集，并评估其在大规模水文建模中的性能。
methodsCn: 本研究使用SWAT模型以黑河流域为研究区域，展示CMADS数据的附加价值。然后分别使用CMADS、CFSR和TWS驱动SWAT模型进行了三次模拟。为了验证CMADS在中国的适用性，我们采用双线性插值法将CMADS数据集与中国气象局国家自动站的要素进行比较。研究使用EWAGE开发的SWAT-CUP软件分析和校准三个模型的参数。选择SUFI-2算法运行SWAT-CUP软件，包括模型校准、验证、敏感性分析和不确定性分析。研究根据显著参数和模拟条件选择了前14个敏感参数进行校准，校准时间为2009年至2010年，并在2011年至2013年期间验证了不同数据集驱动下模型的性能。
datasetCn: CFSR 数据集由美国国家环境预报中心提供，是一个具有高分辨率的全球重分析数据集。CMADS 是本研究开发的新数据集，基于 CLDAS 数据同化技术。CMADS 数据集包含两种格式（即 .dbf 和 .txt），可以方便地转换为其他水文模型使用。CMADS 数据集的第一个版本覆盖整个东亚（0N~65N，60E~160E）。CMADS V1.0、CMADS V1.1、CMADS V1.2 和 CMADS V1.3 的空间分辨率分别为 0.333、0.25、0.125 和 0.0625 度，时间步长为每日，覆盖 2008 年至 2014 年。研究使用了来自 CMADS 的 11 个气象站和来自 CFSR 数据集的 15 个气象站，而在该流域中仅有 4 个 TWS（T1-T4）可用。
findingsCn: 一般来说，CMADS在与TWS观测数据进行评估时，准确性高于CFRS；CMADS还提供了空间连续的气候场，以驱动分布式水文模型，这在气象站稀疏的地区是TWS气候数据的重要优势。因此，使用CMADS和TWS驱动的SWAT模型模拟在月流量和日流量模拟方面表现相似，且两者均优于CFRS。CMADS数据集免费提供，预计将成为中国及东亚其他国家进行分布式水文建模的重要补充。

It influences ground evapotranspiration, runoff, surface reflectivity, surface emissivity, surface sensible heat, and latent heat flux. Accurate estimates of soil moisture are crucial for understanding ecological and physical processes of land and land-atmosphere interactions, and have important applications in meteorology, environmental management, ecology, hydrology, and agriculture.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度在陆地-大气相互作用中发挥着重要作用。它影响地面蒸散、径流、表面反射率、表面发射率、表面感热和潜热通量。准确估计土壤湿度对于理解陆地及其与大气相互作用的生态和物理过程至关重要，并在气象、环境管理、生态学、水文学和农业等领域具有重要应用。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with using atmospheric reanalysis data for hydrological modeling in China?
Definition.QuestionCn: 使用大气重分析数据进行中国水文建模面临的挑战有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: Challenges in using atmospheric reanalysis data for hydrological modeling in China include the poor performance of regional climate models and reanalysis datasets, as well as the unsatisfactory usability and accuracy of datasets like CFSR due to the lack of observational correction and quality control. Additionally, the coarse resolution of global climate models limits their application in regional climate analysis.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在中国使用大气重分析数据进行水文建模的挑战包括区域气候模型和重分析数据集的表现不佳，以及像CFSR这样的数据集由于缺乏观测校正和质量控制而导致的可用性和准确性不令人满意。此外，全球气候模型的粗分辨率限制了它们在区域气候分析中的应用。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the CMADS dataset compare to the CFSR and traditional weather station data in terms of driving hydrological models like SWAT?
Comparison.QuestionCn: CMADS数据集与CFSR和传统气象站数据在驱动SWAT等水文模型方面的比较如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The CMADS dataset generally provides better simulation results for runoff compared to the CFSR and traditional weather station data. CMADS data in combination with the SWAT model can reproduce spatial and temporal responses of hydrological processes more accurately, especially in regions with sparse meteorological stations.
Comparison.AnswerCn: CMADS 数据集通常提供比 CFSR 和传统气象站数据更好的径流模拟结果。CMADS 数据与 SWAT 模型结合使用，可以更准确地再现水文过程的空间和时间响应，特别是在气象站稀疏的地区。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in application and accuracy between satellite remote sensing and land hydrological modeling for soil moisture estimation?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 卫星遥感和陆地水文模型在土壤湿度估计中的应用和准确性有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Satellite remote sensing for soil moisture estimation faces precision challenges related to soil type, surface roughness, and vegetation coverage, leading to inversion errors and insufficient resolutions. In contrast, land hydrological modeling provides better temporal frequency and spatial distribution but is heavily influenced by the model structure and input data quality.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感在土壤湿度估计方面面临与土壤类型、表面粗糙度和植被覆盖相关的精度挑战，导致反演误差和分辨率不足。相比之下，陆地水文模型提供了更好的时间频率和空间分布，但受到模型结构和输入数据质量的严重影响。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the CMADS and CLSMDAS systems differ in their approach to data assimilation for soil moisture analysis in China?
Comparison.QuestionCn: CMADS和CLSMDAS系统在中国土壤湿度分析的数据同化方法上有哪些不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: CMADS utilizes the China Meteorological Administration Land Data Assimilation System (CLDAS) for driving SWAT model simulations, while CLSMDAS specifically implements EnKF and land process models for soil moisture data assimilation tests. CLSMDAS focuses on high-quality atmospheric driving data and single-point observation data for its assimilation methods.
Comparison.AnswerCn: CMADS利用中国气象局陆地数据同化系统（CLDAS）驱动SWAT模型模拟，而CLSMDAS则专门实施了集成卡尔曼滤波（EnKF）和土壤过程模型进行土壤湿度数据同化测试。CLSMDAS专注于高质量的气象驱动数据和单点观测数据用于其同化方法。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What potential methods could be explored to improve the temporal and spatial resolution of soil moisture and temperature datasets for better land-atmosphere interaction modeling?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 可以探索哪些潜在方法来提高土壤湿度和温度数据集的时间和空间分辨率，以便更好地进行陆气相互作用建模？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Potential methods include using advanced data assimilation techniques like EnKF to integrate satellite and ground-based observations, enhancing model structures, and improving input data quality. These methods can help achieve higher resolution datasets, facilitating more accurate modeling of land-atmosphere interactions and improving climate, hydrology, and environmental management research.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 潜在的方法包括使用先进的数据同化技术，如集成卡尔曼滤波（EnKF），以整合卫星和地面观测数据，增强模型结构，并改善输入数据质量。这些方法可以帮助实现更高分辨率的数据集，促进对陆地-大气相互作用的更准确建模，从而改善气候、水文和环境管理研究。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in improving the precision of land model simulations in terms of atmospheric driving data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响提高土地模型模拟精度的挑战因素包括大气驱动数据的质量和可用性。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: One of the main factors contributing to the challenges in improving the precision of land model simulations is the lack of long-term, high-resolution, observational atmospheric driving data. The insufficient availability of ground-level observation data, coupled with the large error in observed soil moisture and high variability of spatial distribution, makes it difficult to verify assimilated data accurately.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 改善土地模型模拟精度的主要挑战之一是缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据。地面观测数据的不足，加上观测土壤湿度的误差较大和空间分布的高变异性，使得准确验证同化数据变得困难。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to develop high-resolution datasets for large-scale hydrological modeling in China?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在中国开发高分辨率数据集对于大规模水文建模是必要的？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: It is necessary to develop high-resolution datasets for large-scale hydrological modeling in China due to the poor performance of regional climate models and existing reanalysis datasets in the region. The coarse resolution of global climate models and insufficient meteorological station coverage in China's vast and complex terrain make it challenging to apply existing datasets effectively for regional studies.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于区域气候模型和现有再分析数据集在中国的表现不佳，开发高分辨率数据集以进行大规模水文建模是必要的。全球气候模型的分辨率较粗，以及中国广阔而复杂的地形中气象站覆盖不足，使得有效应用现有数据集进行区域研究面临挑战。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the reasons behind the preference for using data assimilation methods like EnKF in land model assimilation systems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用数据同化方法如EnKF在陆地模型同化系统中的偏好原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data assimilation methods like the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) are preferred in land model assimilation systems because they use the Monte Carlo method to calculate predicted error covariance of the state, providing a robust way to integrate observational data with model predictions. This helps in addressing uncertainties and improving the temporal and spatial distribution accuracy of variables like soil moisture, which are crucial for understanding land-atmosphere interactions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 数据同化方法，如集合卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF），在陆地模型同化系统中受到青睐，因为它们使用蒙特卡洛方法计算状态的预测误差协方差，提供了一种稳健的方式将观测数据与模型预测相结合。这有助于解决不确定性，并提高土壤湿度等变量的时间和空间分布精度，这对于理解陆气相互作用至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of developing high-resolution meteorological datasets for use in hydrological models?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发高分辨率气象数据集用于水文模型的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective of developing high-resolution meteorological datasets is to provide reliable model simulations that support water and land management practices by addressing the need for precise and temporally-spatially resolved data, especially in regions like China where traditional meteorological stations are sparse.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 开发高分辨率气象数据集的主要目标是提供可靠的模型模拟，以支持水资源和土地管理实践，满足对精确和时空分辨率数据的需求，特别是在像中国这样传统气象站稀少的地区。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to establish a data assimilation system for soil moisture observations in land and atmosphere research?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在陆地和大气研究中，建立土壤湿度观测的数据同化系统是非常重要的。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Establishing a data assimilation system for soil moisture observations is crucial because it enhances the accuracy of soil moisture distribution estimates, which are vital for understanding ecological and physical processes and their interactions with the atmosphere, thereby improving research and applications in meteorology, hydrology, and environmental management.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 建立土壤湿度观测的数据同化系统至关重要，因为它提高了土壤湿度分布估计的准确性，这对于理解生态和物理过程及其与大气的相互作用至关重要，从而改善气象、 hydrology 和环境管理中的研究和应用。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What motivates the integration of various satellite and reanalysis data in the creation of comprehensive atmospheric driving datasets?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 各种卫星和再分析数据的整合动机是什么，以创建全面的大气驱动数据集？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The integration of various satellite and reanalysis data into comprehensive atmospheric driving datasets is motivated by the need to overcome the limitations of individual datasets, such as low resolution and poor regional performance, and to provide high-quality, spatially continuous climate fields that can effectively drive distributed hydrological models.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 将各种卫星和再分析数据整合成综合的气候驱动数据集，是为了克服单一数据集的局限性，如分辨率低和区域性能差，并提供高质量、空间连续的气候场，以有效驱动分布式水文模型。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can atmospheric driving datasets be effectively utilized in the development of high-resolution soil temperature datasets across large geographic regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何有效利用大气驱动数据集在大范围地理区域内开发高分辨率土壤温度数据集？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Atmospheric driving datasets can be utilized by integrating them with land surface models and employing data assimilation techniques like the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF). This involves processing and quality inspecting the atmospheric data, which includes variables such as temperature, wind speed, and solar radiation, and then running simulations to produce high-resolution soil temperature outputs.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 大气驱动数据集可以通过将其与陆面模型集成并采用数据同化技术，如集合卡尔曼滤波（EnKF），来加以利用。这涉及对大气数据进行处理和质量检查，这些数据包括温度、风速和太阳辐射等变量，然后运行模拟以生成高分辨率的土壤温度输出。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the steps involved in creating a comprehensive soil temperature dataset that covers multiple layers and depths over a specified time frame?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn:
创建一个涵盖多个层次和深度的综合土壤温度数据集的步骤包括：

1. 确定研究区域和目标：选择要研究的地理区域，并明确数据集的目的和应用。

2. 选择土壤温度测量深度：根据研究需求，确定需要测量的土壤层次和深度（例如，表层、根层等）。

3. 选择测量设备：选择适合的土壤温度传感器或探头，确保其准确性和可靠性。

4. 设计监测网络：在研究区域内布置测量点，确保覆盖不同的土壤类型和环境条件。

5. 数据采集计划：制定数据采集的时间框架，包括测量频率（如每小时、每日等）和持续时间。

6. 安装设备：在选定的测量点安装土壤温度传感器，确保设备的稳定性和准确性。

7. 数据记录与存储：设置数据记录系统，确保数据能够自动存储并备份。

8. 数据质量控制：定期检查设备的工作状态，确保数据的准确性和一致性。

9. 数据处理与分析：对收集到的数据进行处理，包括清洗、校正和分析，以提取有用的信息。

10. 数据可视化与报告：将分析结果以图表或报告的形式呈现，便于理解和传播。

11. 数据共享与发布：根据需要，将数据集共享给相关研究人员或公众，确保数据的可获取性。

12. 持续监测与更新：根据研究需求，定期更新数据集，保持其时效性和相关性。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The creation involves several key steps: establishing a land data assimilation system, conducting land surface model simulations with atmospheric forcing data, running spin-up simulations for model stability, and using interpolation techniques to achieve desired spatial resolutions. The process also includes organizing data into designated directories based on year and soil layer depth, as well as ensuring data is quality controlled and readily accessible in a standard format.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 创建过程涉及几个关键步骤：建立土地数据同化系统，使用大气强迫数据进行土地表面模型模拟，进行模型稳定性的预热模拟，以及使用插值技术达到所需的空间分辨率。该过程还包括根据年份和土壤层深度将数据组织到指定目录中，以及确保数据经过质量控制并以标准格式便于访问。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enable the collection of high-resolution soil temperature data across large geographic regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得能够在大范围地理区域内收集高分辨率土壤温度数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Technological advancements like the China Meteorological Assimilation Driving Datasets for the SWAT model (CMADS) and the use of the China Meteorological Administration Land Data Assimilation System (CLDAS) allow for the collection of high-resolution soil temperature data. These systems leverage land surface models such as CLM3.5, advanced data assimilation methods, and techniques like bilinear interpolation to achieve high spatial and temporal resolution data.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 技术进步，如中国气象数据同化驱动的SWAT模型（CMADS）和中国气象局陆地数据同化系统（CLDAS）的使用，使得高分辨率土壤温度数据的收集成为可能。这些系统利用了陆面模型，如CLM3.5，先进的数据同化方法，以及双线性插值等技术，以实现高空间和时间分辨率的数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges must be addressed to improve the accuracy and applicability of meteorological datasets in regions with sparse observational data?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了提高气象数据集在观测数据稀少地区的准确性和适用性，必须解决哪些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include the lack of long-term, high-resolution observational atmospheric driving data, insufficient ground-level observation soil moisture data, and high variability in spatial distribution. Addressing these issues requires developing high-resolution datasets, improving data assimilation methods, and integrating satellite remote sensing data with land hydrological modeling to enhance data accuracy and applicability in regions with sparse observational data.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据、地面观测土壤湿度数据不足以及空间分布的高度变异性。解决这些问题需要开发高分辨率数据集、改进数据同化方法，并将卫星遥感数据与陆地水文模型相结合，以提高在观测数据稀缺地区的数据准确性和适用性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might a dataset for soil moisture data assimilation face challenges in achieving high spatial and temporal resolution?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 土壤湿度数据同化的数据集在实现高空间和时间分辨率方面可能面临挑战的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The precision of soil moisture inversion is related to soil type, ground surface roughness, and vegetation coverage, which introduces inversion errors and insufficient temporal and spatial resolutions. Additionally, the lack of long-term, high-resolution, observational atmospheric driving data further complicates the verification and accuracy of assimilated soil moisture data.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 土壤湿度反演的精度与土壤类型、地面粗糙度和植被覆盖度有关，这引入了反演误差和不足的时间及空间分辨率。此外，缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测大气驱动数据进一步复杂化了同化土壤湿度数据的验证和准确性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might existing meteorological datasets be inadequate for large-scale hydrological simulations in certain regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 现有的气象数据集在某些地区可能不足以支持大规模水文模拟的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Existing observation stations are often too sparse to simulate large-scale hydrological simulations effectively. Regional climate models and reanalysis datasets may perform poorly due to their low resolution and lack of local observational correction and quality control, making them less suitable for regional climate assessments.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 现有的观测站往往过于稀疏，无法有效地模拟大规模的水文模拟。区域气候模型和再分析数据集由于分辨率低以及缺乏地方观测校正和质量控制，可能表现不佳，因此不太适合区域气候评估。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of the data assimilation methods used in soil temperature modeling in terms of improving accuracy and resolution?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估用于土壤温度建模的数据同化方法的有效性，以提高准确性和分辨率？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Data assimilation methods like EnKF are widely used in land model assimilation systems to improve the accuracy and resolution of soil temperature modeling. These methods help in integrating observational data with model simulations, enhancing the reliability of the model outputs. However, the effectiveness is often challenged by the availability of high-resolution observational data and the inherent variability in soil properties.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据同化方法，如集合卡尔曼滤波（EnKF），在土地模型同化系统中被广泛应用，以提高土壤温度建模的准确性和分辨率。这些方法有助于将观测数据与模型模拟相结合，从而增强模型输出的可靠性。然而，效果往往受到高分辨率观测数据可用性和土壤性质固有变异性的挑战。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your view, what are the advantages of using high-resolution datasets like CMADS for hydrological modeling in regions with sparse meteorological stations?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在气象站稀少的地区，使用高分辨率数据集如CMADS进行水文建模的优势有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: High-resolution datasets like CMADS provide spatially continuous climate fields, which are crucial for driving distributed hydrologic models in regions with sparse meteorological stations. They offer better accuracy and resolution than traditional datasets, allowing for more reliable hydrological simulations and assessments. This is particularly beneficial for capturing spatial variability in climate conditions and supporting effective water resource management.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 高分辨率数据集如CMADS提供了空间连续的气候场，这对于在气象站稀少的地区驱动分布式水文模型至关重要。它们比传统数据集提供更好的准确性和分辨率，从而允许更可靠的水文模拟和评估。这对于捕捉气候条件的空间变异性和支持有效的水资源管理特别有益。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced in acquiring high-resolution atmospheric driving data for large-scale hydrological simulations.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对获取用于大规模水文模拟的高分辨率大气驱动数据所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: One of the challenges in acquiring high-resolution atmospheric driving data for large-scale hydrological simulations is the scarcity of long-term, observational data with fine spatial and temporal resolution. The lack of ground-level observation data and the inherent variability in soil moisture distribution make it difficult to verify and improve model simulations.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 获取大规模水文模拟所需的高分辨率大气驱动数据的挑战之一是缺乏长期、观测数据的细空间和时间分辨率。地面观测数据的匮乏以及土壤湿度分布的固有变异性使得验证和改进模型模拟变得困难。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of the methods used to validate the performance of datasets in driving hydrological models like the SWAT model.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解用于验证数据集在驱动水文模型（如SWAT模型）性能的方法。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The performance of datasets in driving hydrological models like the SWAT model can be validated by comparing the model outputs with observed data from multiple sources, such as hydrological control stations. Calibration, validation, and sensitivity analysis using software tools like SWAT-CUP help to assess the accuracy and reliability of the datasets.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 通过将模型输出与来自多个来源（如水文控制站）的观测数据进行比较，可以验证驱动水文模型（如SWAT模型）数据集的性能。使用SWAT-CUP等软件工具进行校准、验证和敏感性分析，有助于评估数据集的准确性和可靠性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore various data collection methods that could enhance the temporal and spatial resolution of soil moisture datasets in East Asia.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨各种数据收集方法，以提高东亚地区土壤湿度数据集的时间和空间分辨率。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Data collection methods for improving soil moisture datasets in East Asia include the use of satellite remote sensing, such as AMSR-E, and land hydrological modeling. These methods can be combined with data assimilation techniques like the EnKF to refine data accuracy and resolution. The development of high-quality atmospheric driving data using reanalysis data and observational correction is crucial for improving modeling precision.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 改善东亚土壤湿度数据集的数据收集方法包括使用卫星遥感，如AMSR-E，以及陆地水文模型。这些方法可以与数据同化技术（如EnKF）结合，以提高数据的准确性和分辨率。利用再分析数据和观测校正开发高质量的气象驱动数据对于提高模型精度至关重要。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced in verifying soil moisture observations obtained through satellite remote sensing and modeling simulations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析通过卫星遥感和建模模拟获得的土壤湿度观测值验证所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in verifying soil moisture observations include the uncertainty in soil type, ground surface roughness, and vegetation coverage, which affect the accuracy of satellite remote sensing inversion. Additionally, the lack of long-term, high-resolution observational data and the inherent variability in soil moisture distribution pose verification difficulties. The precision of modeling simulations is also heavily influenced by the structure of the models and the quality of input data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 验证土壤湿度观测的挑战包括土壤类型、地表粗糙度和植被覆盖的不同，这些因素影响卫星遥感反演的准确性。此外，缺乏长期、高分辨率的观测数据以及土壤湿度分布的固有变异性也带来了验证困难。模型模拟的精度也受到模型结构和输入数据质量的严重影响。
